values.name: Get Content Controls
values.description: Get all Content Controls and print out the length of individual CC text.

values.name: Get Content Control By Tag
values.description: Get Content Control by tag and print its value.

values.name: Set Content Control
values.description: Set content control around selection and change the content and properties.

values.name: Set Content Control around Paragraph
values.description: Turn all paragraphs into content controls.

values.name: Get Paragraphs
values.description: Get all paragraphs and print out the length of individual paragraphs.

values.name: Clear Content
values.description: Clear content of the body of the document.

values.name: Insert Html
values.description: Insert HTML blop into current selection.

values.name: Insert OOXML
values.description: Insert OXML blop into current selection.

values.name: Insert Text into Document
values.description: Insert text at the end of the document.

values.name: Insert Picture from Base64
values.description: Insert picture into the first paragraph.
